ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(OR(ISPICKVAL(Species__c, "Other"), ISPICKVAL(Species__c, "Other Livestock"), ISPICKVAL(Species__c, "Exotics"), ISPICKVAL(Species__c, "Fowl"), ISPICKVAL(Species__c, "Birds")), Breed_Type__c ="", Case__r.RecordType.Id = "0125A000001YZdo")
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Additional detail is required for Species/Breed for the Animal Type selected.
